card.name: Alms Collector
card.property: Flash If an opponent would draw two or more cards, instead you and that player each draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no justice when some profit and others go without."

card.name: Balan, Wandering Knight
card.property: First strike Balan, Wandering Knight has double strike as long as two or more Equipment are attached to it. {1}{W}: Attach all Equipment you control to Balan.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What weapon will you bear against one who's mastered them all?"

card.name: Curse of Vitality
card.property: Enchant player Whenever enchanted player is attacked, you gain 2 life. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Good health beckons many a vigorous follower.

card.name: Fortunate Few
card.property: Choose a nonland permanent you don't control, then each other player chooses a nonland permanent he or she doesn't control that hasn't been chosen this way. Destroy all other nonland permanents.

card.name: Kindred Boon
card.property: As Kindred Boon enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. {1}{W}: Put a divinity counter on target creature you control of the chosen type. Each creature you control with a divinity counter on it has indestructible.

card.name: Scalelord Reckoner
card.property: Flying Whenever a Dragon you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, destroy target nonland permanent that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The justice of dragons demands more than just an eye for an eye.

card.name: Stalking Leonin
card.property: When Stalking Leonin enters the battlefield, secretly choose an opponent. Reveal the player you chose: Exile target creature that's attacking you if it's controlled by the chosen player. Activate this ability only once.

card.name: Teferi's Protection
card.property: Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you have protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.) Exile Teferi's Protection.

card.name: Curse of Verbosity
card.property: Enchant player Whenever enchanted player is attacked, you draw a card. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Idle chatter beckons many an attentive ear.

card.name: Galecaster Colossus
card.property: Tap an untapped Wizard you control: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ground bones, broken glass, and splintered shipwrecks make up the sands of his shores.

card.name: Kindred Discovery
card.property: As Kindred Discovery enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Whenever a creature you control of the chosen type enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few things are truly "lost" at sea.

card.name: Magus of the Mind
card.property: {U}, {T}, Sacrifice Magus of the Mind: Shuffle your library, then exile the top X cards, where X is one plus the number of spells cast this turn. Until end of turn, you may play cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll show you what you truly desire."

card.name: Portal Mage
card.property: Flash When Portal Mage enters the battlefield during the declare attackers step, you may reselect which player or planeswalker target attacking creature is attacking. (It can't attack its controller or its controller's planeswalkers.)

card.name: Bloodline Necromancer
card.property: Lifelink When Bloodline Necromancer enters the battlefield, you may return target Vampire or Wizard creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The veil of death hides little from our kind."

card.name: Boneyard Scourge
card.property: Flying Whenever a Dragon you control dies while Boneyard Scourge is in your graveyard, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, return Boneyard Scourge from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death arrives on tattered wings and stolen bones.

card.name: Curse of Disturbance
card.property: Enchant player Whenever enchanted player is attacked, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sounds of life beckon many a restless soul.

card.name: Kheru Mind-Eater
card.property: Menace Whenever Kheru Mind-Eater deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles a card from his or her hand face down. You may look at and play cards exiled with Kheru Mind-Eater.

card.name: Kindred Dominance
card.property: Choose a creature type. Destroy all creatures that aren't of the chosen type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the end, the lights fade, the land withers, and only the dead and vile remain.

card.name: New Blood
card.property: As an additional cost to cast New Blood, tap an untapped Vampire you control. Gain control of target creature. Change the text of that creature by replacing all instances of one creature type with Vampire.

card.name: Patron of the Vein
card.property: Flying When Patron of the Vein enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls. Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, exile it and put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.

card.name: Vindictive Lich
card.property: When Vindictive Lich dies, choose one or more. Each mode must target a different player. • Target opponent sacrifices a creature. • Target opponent discards two cards. • Target opponent loses 5 life.

card.name: Bloodsworn Steward
card.property: Flying Commander creatures you control get +2/+2 and have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My liege will lead and I will follow—to the battlefield, to the grave, and beyond."

card.name: Crimson Honor Guard
card.property: Trample At the beginning of each player's end step, Crimson Honor Guard deals 4 damage to that player unless he or she controls a commander.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The finest soldiers aren't worth a whit without a set of hands to lead them and a set of eyes to guide them.

card.name: Curse of Opulence
card.property: Enchant player Whenever enchanted player is attacked, create a colorless artifact token named Gold. It has "Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool." Each opponent attacking that player does the same.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jingling coins beckon many an eager hand.

card.name: Disrupt Decorum
card.property: Goad all creatures you don't control. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)

card.name: Izzet Chemister
card.property: Haste {R}, {T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. {1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Izzet Chemister: Cast any number of cards exiled with Izzet Chemister without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Kindred Charge
card.property: Choose a creature type. For each creature you control of the chosen type, create a token that's a copy of that creature. Those tokens gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Shifting Shadow
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has haste and "At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy this creature. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and attach Shifting Shadow to it, then put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in a random order."

card.name: Territorial Hellkite
card.property: Flying, haste At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose an opponent at random that Territorial Hellkite didn't attack during your last combat. Territorial Hellkite attacks that player this combat if able. If you can't choose an opponent this way, tap Territorial Hellkite.

card.name: Curse of Bounty
card.property: Enchant player Whenever enchanted player is attacked, untap all nonland permanents you control. Each opponent attacking that player untaps all nonland permanents he or she controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Flavorful aromas beckon many a salivating maw.

card.name: Hungry Lynx
card.property: Cats you control have protection from Rats. (They can't be blocked, targeted, or dealt damage by Rats.) At the beginning of your end step, target opponent creates a 1/1 black Rat creature token with deathtouch. Whenever a Rat dies, put a +1/+1 counter on each Cat you control.

card.name: Kindred Summons
card.property: Choose a creature type. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal X creature cards of the chosen type, where X is the number of creatures you control of that type. Put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your library.

card.name: Qasali Slingers
card.property: Reach Whenever Qasali Slingers or another Cat enters the battlefield under your control, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All things will crumble, whether by time or by force.

card.name: Traverse the Outlands
card.property: Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control. Put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With such great footsteps, everything is within walking distance.

card.name: Arahbo, Roar of the World
card.property: Eminence — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if Arahbo, Roar of the World is in the command zone or on the battlefield, another target Cat you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Whenever another Cat you control attacks, you may pay {1}{G}{W}. If you do, it gains trample and gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.

card.name: Edgar Markov
card.property: Eminence — Whenever you cast another Vampire spell, if Edgar Markov is in the command zone or on the battlefield, create a 1/1 black Vampire creature token. First strike, haste Whenever Edgar Markov attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.

card.name: Fractured Identity
card.property: Exile target nonland permanent. Each player other than its controller creates a token that's a copy of it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Self-reflection is not without its perils.

card.name: Inalla, Archmage Ritualist
card.property: Eminence — Whenever another nontoken Wizard enters the battlefield under your control, if Inalla, Archmage Ritualist is in the command zone or on the battlefield, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that Wizard. The token gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. Tap five untapped Wizards you control: Target player loses 7 life.

card.name: Kess, Dissident Mage
card.property: Flying During each of your turns, you may cast an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. If a card cast this way would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Loss has no meaning here. You cannot take from those who have nothing."

card.name: Licia, Sanguine Tribune
card.property: Licia, Sanguine Tribune costs {1} less to cast for each 1 life you gained this turn. First strike, lifelink Pay 5 life: Put three +1/+1 counters on Licia. Activate this ability only during your turn and only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I give my blood, my life, all I have in exchange for victory."

card.name: Mairsil, the Pretender
card.property: When Mairsil, the Pretender enters the battlefield, you may exile an artifact or creature card from your hand or graveyard and put a cage counter on it. Mairsil, the Pretender has all activated abilities of all cards you own in exile with cage counters on them. You may activate each of those abilities only once each turn.

card.name: Mathas, Fiend Seeker
card.property: Menace At the beginning of your end step, put a bounty counter on target creature an opponent controls. For as long as that creature has a bounty counter on it, it has "When this creature dies, each opponent draws a card and gains 2 life."

card.name: Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist
card.property: First strike Whenever Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist attacks, each opponent can't block with more than one creature this combat. As long as Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist is tapped, no more than one creature can attack you each combat.

card.name: Nazahn, Revered Bladesmith
card.property: When Nazahn, Revered Bladesmith enters the battlefield, search your library for an Equipment card and reveal it. If you reveal a card named Hammer of Nazahn this way, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Whenever an equipped creature you control attacks, you may tap target creature defending player controls.

card.name: O-Kagachi, Vengeful Kami

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: Flying, trample Whenever O-Kagachi, Vengeful Kami deals combat damage to a player, if that player attacked you during his or her last turn, exile target nonland permanent that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At his behest the Kami War began to regain That Which Was Taken.

card.name: Taigam, Ojutai Master
card.property: Instant, sorcery, and Dragon spells you control can't be countered by spells or abilities. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand, if Taigam, Ojutai Master attacked this turn, that spell gains rebound. (Exile the spell as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast that card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Taigam, Sidisi's Hand
card.property: Skip your draw step. At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. {B}, {T}, Exile X cards from your graveyard: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.

card.name: The Ur-Dragon

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: Eminence — As long as The Ur-Dragon is in the command zone or on the battlefield, other Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Flying Whenever one or more Dragons you control attack, draw that many cards, then you may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Wasitora, Nekoru Queen
card.property: Flying, trample Whenever Wasitora, Nekoru Queen deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices a creature. If the player can't, you create a 3/3 black, red, and green Cat Dragon creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once a fierce foe, she would become one of Madara's greatest protectors.

card.name: Bloodforged Battle-Axe

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Spilled blood always begets more of the same.

card.name: Hammer of Nazahn
Heirloom Blade
Herald's Horn
card.property: As Herald's Horn enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creature spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast. At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card of the chosen type, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.

card.name: Mirror of the Forebears
card.property: As Mirror of the Forebears enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. {1}: Until end of turn, Mirror of the Forebears becomes a copy of target creature you control of the chosen type, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

card.name: Ramos, Dragon Engine
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Ramos, Dragon Engine for each of that spell's colors. Remove five +1/+1 counters from Ramos: Add {W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Path of Ancestry
card.property: Path of Ancestry enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1.

card.name: Blind Obedience
card.property: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Artifacts and creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: By the time your knees have worn through your robe, you may have begun to learn your place."

card.name: Condemn
card.property: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No doubt the arbiters would put you away, after all the documents are signed. But I will have justice now." —Alovnek, Boros guildmage

card.name: Divine Reckoning
card.property: Each player chooses a creature he or she controls. Destroy the rest. Flashback {5}{W}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Fell the Mighty
card.property: Destroy all creatures with power greater than target creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They had it coming." —Squire Imalia, savior of Thiswick

card.name: Jareth, Leonine Titan
card.property: Whenever Jareth, Leonine Titan blocks, it gets +7/+7 until end of turn. {W}: Jareth gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Light's champion in the stronghold of darkness.

card.name: Jazal Goldmane
card.property: First strike {3}{W}{W}: Attacking creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As my kha, he is the source of my inspiration. As my brother, he is the embodiment of my aspirations." —Ajani Goldmane

card.name: Kemba, Kha Regent
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 white Cat creature token for each Equipment attached to Kemba, Kha Regent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am not Raksha. I never will be. But I refuse to be the kha who watched her pride be torn asunder."

card.name: Leonin Arbiter
card.property: Players can't search libraries. Any player may pay {2} for that player to ignore this effect until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our people are torn by infighting. Until the two sides reconcile, our laws can carry no meaning."

card.name: Leonin Relic-Warder
card.property: When Leonin Relic-Warder enters the battlefield, you may exile target artifact or enchantment. When Leonin Relic-Warder leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Leonin Shikari
card.property: You may activate equip abilities any time you could cast an instant.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her instinct is as sharp as her blade.

card.name: Orator of Ojutai
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Orator of Ojutai, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand. Defender, flying When Orator of Ojutai enters the battlefield, if you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast Orator of Ojutai, draw a card.

card.name: Oreskos Explorer
card.property: When Oreskos Explorer enters the battlefield, search your library for up to X Plains cards, where X is the number of players who control more lands than you. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Raksha Golden Cub
card.property: Vigilance As long as Raksha Golden Cub is equipped, Cat creatures you control get +2/+2 and have double strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some believe that Raksha, youngest of the kha, is the reincarnation of Dakan, the first and mightiest of leonin leaders.

card.name: Return to Dust
card.property: Exile target artifact or enchantment. If you cast this spell during your main phase, you may exile up to one other target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some timelines forever fray, branch, and intermingle. Others end abruptly.

card.name: Rout
card.property: You may cast Rout as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.) Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "End this. What I seek is far greater." —Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

card.name: Seht's Tiger
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Seht's Tiger enters the battlefield, you gain protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (You can't be targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything of the chosen color.)

card.name: Spirit of the Hearth
card.property: Flying You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thieves know that a snarl in the night means, "Rob another house."

card.name: Sunscorch Regent
card.property: Flying Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Sunscorch Regent and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We trust in the scalelords, bringers of justice that none can escape." —Urdnan, Dromoka warrior

card.name: Sunspear Shikari
card.property: As long as Sunspear Shikari is equipped, it has first strike and lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Left without their leader Raksha, the leonin split into two prides: one side supported the regent kha, while the other rebelled in fury.

card.name: Swords to Plowshares
card.property: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.

card.name: Taj-Nar Swordsmith
card.property: When Taj-Nar Swordsmith enters the battlefield, you may pay {X}. If you do, search your library for an Equipment card with converted mana cost X or less and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: White Sun's Zenith
card.property: Create X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens. Shuffle White Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the Battle of Liet Field, the white sun crested above Taj-Nar, bringing hope to all who survived the carnage.

card.name: Wing Shards
card.property: Target player sacrifices an attacking creature. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

card.name: Arcanis the Omnipotent
card.property: {T}: Draw three cards. {2}{U}{U}: Return Arcanis the Omnipotent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He has journeyed where none have been before. Now he returns to ensure that none follow.

card.name: Archaeomancer
card.property: When Archaeomancer enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Words of power never disappear. They sleep, awaiting those with the will to rouse them."

card.name: Azami, Lady of Scrolls
card.property: Tap an untapped Wizard you control: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Choices belong to those with the luxuries of time and distance. We have neither. I recommend we proceed with the plan to destroy all shrines of the kami."—Lady Azami, letter to Sensei Hisoka

card.name: Body Double
card.property: You may have Body Double enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature card in a graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am who I pretend to be."

card.name: Clone Legion
card.property: For each creature target player controls, create a token that's a copy of that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their lust for battle was so great that they didn't care their enemies wore their own faces.

card.name: Harbinger of the Tides
card.property: You may cast Harbinger of the Tides as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.) When Harbinger of the Tides enters the battlefield, you may return target tapped creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

card.name: Into the Roil
card.property: Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.) Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If Into the Roil was kicked, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Roil tide! Roil tide! Tie yourselves down!"

card.name: Merchant of Secrets
card.property: When Merchant of Secrets enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To scrape out a living in Aphetto, wizards are reduced to selling rumors, lies, forgeries, or—if they get desperate enough—the truth.

card.name: Monastery Siege
card.property: As Monastery Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons. • Khans — At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card, then discard a card. • Dragons — Spells your opponents cast that target you or a permanent you control cost {2} more to cast.

card.name: Opportunity
card.property: Target player draws four cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Opportunity isn't something you wait for. It's something you create."

card.name: Polymorphist's Jest
card.property: Until end of turn, each creature target player controls loses all abilities and becomes a blue Frog with base power and toughness 1/1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The flies were bothering me."—Jalira, master polymorphist

card.name: Reality Shift
card.property: Exile target creature. Its controller manifests the top card of his or her library. (That player puts the top card of his or her library onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. If it's a creature card, it can be turned face up any time for its mana cost.)

card.name: Sea Gate Oracle
card.property: When Sea Gate Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Serendib Sorcerer
card.property: {T}: Target creature other than Serendib Sorcerer has base power and toughness 0/2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even a dragon is humble as a kitten if it thinks itself a slave."

card.name: Spelltwine
card.property: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard and target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard. Copy those cards. Cast the copies if able without paying their mana costs. Exile Spelltwine.

card.name: Ambition's Cost
card.property: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Conquering your first world is the hardest, after all. My power grew as I moved from world to world, taking anything that would make the next taking easier."—Ob Nixilis

card.name: Anowon, the Ruin Sage
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player sacrifices a non-Vampire creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So many have died in search of that map. And now it appears in the hands of the arrogant child Chandra Nalaar."

card.name: Apprentice Necromancer
card.property: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Apprentice Necromancer: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A mage willing to dedicate his life to his craft.

card.name: Black Market
card.property: Whenever a creature dies, put a charge counter on Black Market. At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add {B} to your mana pool for each charge counter on Black Market.

card.name: Blood Artist
card.property: Whenever Blood Artist or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Great art can never be created without great suffering."

card.name: Blood Tribute

card.name: Bloodhusk Ritualist
card.property: Multikicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} any number of times as you cast this spell.) When Bloodhusk Ritualist enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card for each time it was kicked.

card.name: Bloodlord of Vaasgoth
card.property: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.) Flying Whenever you cast a Vampire creature spell, it gains bloodthirst 3.

card.name: Butcher of Malakir
card.property: Flying Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His verdict is always guilty. His sentence is always death.

card.name: Captivating Vampire
card.property: Other Vampire creatures you control get +1/+1. Tap five untapped Vampires you control: Gain control of target creature. It becomes a Vampire in addition to its other types.

card.name: Consuming Vapors
card.property: Target player sacrifices a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Corpse Augur
card.property: When Corpse Augur dies, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of creature cards in target player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even when the flesh grows cold, knowledge waits in the bones for a master to release it.

card.name: Crux of Fate
card.property: Choose one — • Destroy all Dragon creatures. • Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ugin's whispered summons led Sarkhan Vol to the moment that would echo down the centuries and seal Tarkir's fate: the primal battle between Ugin and Nicol Bolas.

card.name: Damnable Pact
card.property: Target player draws X cards and loses X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Silumgar's mind is a dark labyrinth, full of grim secrets and subtle traps."—Siara, the Dragon's Mouth

card.name: Dark Impostor

property.name: Flavor
